info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Meagher, southwestern Judith Basin and southeastern Cascade Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1026 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles south of Belt, or 32 miles west of Stanford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Neihart, Sluice Boxes State Park, Raynesford, and Monarch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
